```{r problem_2}
output = vector("list", length = 5000)

dataset_generator = function(x){
  n = 30
  sigma = 5
  mu = 0 #this needs to reference to the outside list??? 
  mu_list = c(0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
  
  sample = rnorm(n, mu, sigma)
  result = t.test(sample, paired = FALSE, conf.level = 0.05) %>% 
    broom::tidy()
  
  extract_result = tibble(
    estimate = result$estimate,
    p.value = result$p.value
  )
}

for (i in 1:5000) {
  output[[i]] = dataset_generator(list(extract_result[[i]]))
}
```
